name: Daryabadi
text: Blissful are the believers'-

name: Daryabadi
text: Those who in their prayer are lowly.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who from everything vain turn away.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who for the sake of purification are doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who of their private Parts are guards.

name: Daryabadi
text: Save in regard to their spouses and those whom their right hands own: so they are not blameworthy-

name: Daryabadi
text: And Whosoever seeketh beyond that, then it is these who are the transgressors

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who of their trusts and covenant are keepers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who of their prayers are observant.

name: Daryabadi
text: These! they are the inheritors.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who shall inherit Paradise; therein they shall be abiders.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We created man of an extract of clay.

name: Daryabadi
text: Thereafter We made him of a Sperm In a receptacle safe.

name: Daryabadi
text: -Thereafter We created the sperm a clot; then We created the clot a lump of flesh; then We created the lump of flesh bones; then We clothed the bones with flesh: thereafter We brought him forth as anot her creature. Blest then be Allah, the Best of creators!

name: Daryabadi
text: Then verily, thereafter, ye are sure to die.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then verily on the Day of Judgment ye shall be raised up.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We created above you seven paths, and of the creation We have not been neglectful.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We sent down from the heaven water in measure, and We caused it to settle in the earth; and verily to take it away We are Able.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We brought forth for you therewith gardens of date- palm and vines; for you therein are fruits many, and thereof ye eat.

name: Daryabadi
text: And also a tree that springeth forth from mount Sinai, that groweth oil and is a sauce for the eaters.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily in the cattle for you is a lesson. We give you to drink of that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are advantages many, and of them ye eat.

name: Daryabadi
text: And on them and on the ship ye are borne.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We sent Nuh unto his people, and he said: O my people! worship Allah; for you there is no god but he; will ye not then fear Him!

name: Daryabadi
text: Then said the chiefs of those who disbelieved among his people: this is no other than a human being like unto you, he seeketh to make himself superior unto; and if God had willed, He would save sent down angels; we have not heard of this among our fathers ancient.

name: Daryabadi
text: He is only a man in whom is madness wherefore await for him for a season.

name: Daryabadi
text: Nuh said: my Lord! vindicate me, for they belie me.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We revealed unto him, saying: build the ark under Our eyes and Our Revelation; then when Our command cometh and the oven boileth over, make way therein of every pair two, and thy household save him thereof against whom there hath already gone forth the word; and address me not in respect of those who have done wrong; verily they are to be drowned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when thou art settled, thou and those with thee, in the ark, say thou: praise unto Allah who hath delivered us from the wrong doing people.

name: Daryabadi
text: And say thou, my Lord! cause me to land at a landing blest, and thou art the Best of these who bring to land.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily in that are signs; verily We have ever been provers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then, after them We brought forth anot her generation.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We sent amongst them an apostle from amongst themselves, saying: worship Allah, for you there is no god but he; will ye then not fear Him?

name: Daryabadi
text: And said the chiefs of those who disbelieved among his people and belied the meeting of the Hereafter and whom We had luxuriated in the life of the World: this is no other than a human being like unto you: he eateth of that whereof ye eat, and he drinketh of that which ye drink.

name: Daryabadi
text: And were ye to obey a human being like you, ye are forthwith to be losers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Promiseth he unto you that ye, when ye have died and have become dust and bones, ye are to be brought forth?

name: Daryabadi
text: Away! away with that wherewith ye are promised;

name: Daryabadi
text: There is nought but our life of the world; we die and we live, and we are not going to be raised Up.

name: Daryabadi
text: He is but a man who hath fabricated against God a lie, and in him we are not going to be believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! vindicate for they belie me.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: after a little while they will become regretful.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then the shout laid hold of them in truth, and We made them a refuse; so away with the wrong-doing people!

name: Daryabadi
text: Then after them We brought forth other generations.

name: Daryabadi
text: No community can anticipate their term, nor can they lay behind.

name: Daryabadi
text: Thereafter We sent Our apostles, successively. So oft as there came unto a community their apostle, they belied him, so We made them follow one anot her, and We made them bywords: so away with a people who believe not!

name: Daryabadi
text: Thereafter We sent Musa and his brother Harun with Our signs and an authority manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: Unto Fir'awn and his chiefs, but they grew stiff-necked, and they were a people self-exalting.

name: Daryabadi
text: So they said: shall we believe In two human beings like unto us, while their nation are to us slaves?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they belied the twain; so they became of those who were destroyed.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We vouchsafed unto Musa the Book, that haply they may be guided.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We made the son of Maryam and his mother a sign; and We sheltered the twain on a height: a quiet abode and running water.

name: Daryabadi
text: O Ye apostles! eat the good things and work righteously; verily of that which ye work I am the Knower.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily this religion of yours is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they cut their affair among them in regard to the Scriptures: each band in that which is with them rejoicing.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore leave thou them in their bewilderment for a season.

name: Daryabadi
text: Deem they that in the wealth and sons wherewith We enlarge them.

name: Daryabadi
text: We are hastening them on to good things? Aye! they perceive not.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily those who for fear of their Lord are in awe.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who in the signs of their Lord do believe.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who with their Lord associate not anyone.

name: Daryabadi
text: And those who give whatsoever they give, while their hearts are anxious that unto their Lord they are to be retutners

name: Daryabadi
text: These are hastening on to good, and they are therein foremost.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We task not any soul except according to its capacity, and with Us is a book speaking with truth, and they will not be wronged.

name: Daryabadi
text: Aye! their hearts are in bewilderment in respect thereof, and they have works beside that, of which they are workers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Until when We lay hold of the luxuriant ones of them with the torment, and lo! then they are imploring!

name: Daryabadi
text: Implore not to-day; verily ye from Us are not to be succoured.

name: Daryabadi
text: Surely My signs have been rehearsed unto you, and upon your heel ye were wont to draw back.

name: Daryabadi
text: Stiff-necked, discoursing thereof by night, reviling.

name: Daryabadi
text: Pondered they not over the Word? or came there unto them that which came not unto their fathers ancient?

name: Daryabadi
text: Or, is it that they recognised not their apostle, and so of him they become deniers?

name: Daryabadi
text: Or, say they: in him is madness? O Aye he brought them the truth, and most of them to the truth are averse.

name: Daryabadi
text: And were the truth to follow their desires there would have been corrupted the heavens and the earth and whatsoever is therein. Aye! We have come to them with their admonition; so it is from their admonition that they turn away.

name: Daryabadi
text: Or, is it that thou askest of them any maintenance? The maintenance of thy Lord is better, and He is the Best of providers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily thou! thou callest them unto a Path straight.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily those who believe not in the Hereafter are from the path deviating.

name: Daryabadi
text: And though We have mercy on them We may remove whatsoever of hurt is with them, surely they would persist in their exorbitance, wandering perplexed.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We took hold of them with the torment, yet they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor did they entreat.

name: Daryabadi
text: Until when we shall open upon them a portal of severe torment, and lo! thereat they are desparing

name: Daryabadi
text: And He it is Who brought forth for you hearing and sight and hearts, little thanks ye give!

name: Daryabadi
text: And He it is Who spread you on the earth, and unto Him ye will be gathered.

name: Daryabadi
text: And He it is Who quickeneth and causeth to die, and His is the alternation of night and day; will ye not then reflect?

name: Daryabadi
text: Aye! they say the like of that which said the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: They say: when we are dead, and have become dust and bones, shall we verily be raised up?

name: Daryabadi
text: Assuredly this we have been promised--we and our fathers-- aforetime: naught is this but the fables of the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: whose is the earth and whosoever is therein, if you know?

name: Daryabadi
text: They will surely say: God's. Say thou: will ye not then heed?

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the mighty throne?

name: Daryabadi
text: They will surely say: God. Say thou: will ye not then fear?

name: Daryabadi
text: Saythou: in whose hands is the governance of everything, and who sheltereth but from whom none is sheltered, if ye know?

name: Daryabadi
text: They will surely say: God's. Say thou: how then are ye turned away?

name: Daryabadi
text: Aye! We have brought them the truth and verily they are the liars.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah hath not betaken to Himself any son, and there is not along Him any god; else each god would have gone off with that which he had created, and one of them would have exalted himself above the others. Hallowed be Allah above that which they ascribe!

name: Daryabadi
text: Knower of the unseen and the seen, Exalted is He above that which they associate!

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou; my Lord! if Thou wilt shew me that wherewith they are threatened.

name: Daryabadi
text: My Lord! then place me not among the wrong-doing people.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily to shew them that wherewith We threaten them We are surely Able.

name: Daryabadi
text: Repel thou the evil with that which is the best, We are the Best Knower of that which they utter.

name: Daryabadi
text: And say thou: my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee against the whisperings of the satans;

name: Daryabadi
text: And I seek refuge with Thee, my Lord! lest they may be present with me

name: Daryabadi
text: lt ceaseth not until when death cometh to one of them, and he saith: my Lord! send me back.

name: Daryabadi
text: That I may work righteously in that which have left. By no means! It is but a word he uttereth; and before them is a barrier until the Day when they shall be raised.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then when the Trumpet is blown there will be no lineage among them that Day, nor will they ask of each other.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then he whose balances shall be heavy --these! they are the blissful ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And he whose balances shall be light--these are they who have lost themselves: in Hell they are abiders.

name: Daryabadi
text: The Fire will scorch their faces, and therein they shall be grinning.

name: Daryabadi
text: Have not My revelations been rehearsed unto you, and them ye have been belying?

name: Daryabadi
text: They will say: our Lord! our wretchedness overcame, us, and we have been a people erring.

name: Daryabadi
text: O our Lord! take us forth from it: then if we return, we shall be wrong-doers indeed.

name: Daryabadi
text: He shall say: slink away there unto, and speak not unto Me.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily there was a party of My bondmen who said: our Lord! we have believed, wherefore forgive us and have mercy upon us, and Thou art the Best of the merciful ones!

name: Daryabadi
text: Then ye took them mockingly, so that they caused you to forget remembrance of Me, and at them ye were wont to laugh.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily I have recompensed them today for they bear patiently, verily they! are the achievers.

name: Daryabadi
text: He will say: how long tarried ye on the earth in number of year?

name: Daryabadi
text: -They will say we tarried a day or part of a day; ask those who keep count.

name: Daryabadi
text: He will say: ye tarried a little indeed; would that ye had known that:

name: Daryabadi
text: Deem ye that We have created youl in vain and that unto Us ye are not to be returned?

name: Daryabadi
text: So exalted be Allah, the True King! there is no god but he, Lord of the Throne honoured.

name: Daryabadi
text: And whosoever calleth, along with Allah, unto anot her god, of whom he hath no warranty, then his reckoning is only with his Lord; verily thrive will not the infidels.

name: Daryabadi
text: And say thou: my Lord! forgive and have mercy, and Thou art the Best of the merciful ones.
